name: Speedboat Alchemy
description:
Use your alchemy-boat to blast your way through frog town and win the potion prize! Controls:
  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Reverse
  • A - Steer Left
  • D - Steer Right
  • Space - Shoot
  • R or Left Shift - Toggle the Alchemy Menu
Alchemy:

With the alchemy menu open, drag the ingredients with your mouse into the pot and close the menu to replenish your ammo with wild new properties!

Created for Ludum Dare 49.
Made By:

  • @billy-dent

Secret cheat code: Press 1-9 to teleport throughout the map.
